data.title: Sorting files by dates
data.solution:
import sys
import math
from datetime import datetime


# Auto-generated code below aims at helping you parse
# the standard input according to the problem statement.
files = []
dates = []

n = int(input())

for i in range(n):
    file = input()
    files.append(file)

for i in range(n):
    date = input()
    dates.append(date)


# Combinaison des noms de fichiers, des dates et des indices
file_date_index_triplets = list(zip(files, dates, range(n)))

# Tri en fonction des dates complètes (du plus récent au plus ancien) et des noms en cas de dates identiques
sorted_file_date_index_triplets = sorted(file_date_index_triplets, key=lambda x: (datetime.strptime(x[1], "%d-%m-%Y"), x[0]), reverse=True)

# Récupération des noms de fichiers triés
sorted_files = [triplet[0] for triplet in sorted_file_date_index_triplets]


# Affichage des noms de fichiers triés
for file in range(len(sorted_files)-1,-1,-1):
    print(sorted_files[file])
data.statement:
You must sort the [[N]] [[file]] given according to their [[date]], from oldest to newest.
If multiple files have the same date, you should then sort them in alphabetical order (case-sensitive).
data.constraints:
[[date]] format : DD-MM-YYY, where DD is the day, MM the month and YYYY the year.
[[file]] consist of English letters and {{.}} only.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You must sort the N file given according to their date, from oldest to newest.
If multiple files have the same date, you should then sort them in alphabetical order (case-sensitive).
Input
Line 1 : N the number of files to sort.

Next N lines : file a string containing files names.

Next N lines : date a string containing dates of the files.
Output
N lines : sorted_file a string containing the sorted file name.
Constraints
date format : DD-MM-YYY, where DD is the day, MM the month and YYYY the year.
file consist of English letters and . only.
Example
Input
3
mission.txt
account.xls
dissertation.docx
21-12-2023
20-12-2023
22-12-2023
Output
account.xls
mission.txt
dissertation.docx
